message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.CY 

This paper deals with personalized recommendation of news articles using a contextual bandit approach, which involves machine learning and optimization techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also discusses user interaction and feedback, which suggests a possible fit with cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) and cs.CY (Computers and Society).
